amendment.description: Amendment sought to clarify that rule exceptions should take effect in the event that there is a threat to health or safety or other emergency and not only when such threat is imminent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part A of House Report 114-388 to clarify that the exception to the rule should take effect in the event that there is a threat to health or safety or other emergency and not only when such threat is imminent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 241 (Roll no. 10).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 241 (Roll no. 10).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
